mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.password AS "password", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", c.token AS "memberExtend.token", c.nickname AS "memberExtend.nickname", c.qq AS "memberExtend.qq"
left join reserve_member_extend as c on c.id=a.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve_member( id, mobile, password, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{mobile}, #{password}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve_member set sex = #{sex}, province = #{province},city = #{city} where id = #{id}
